commit message: CHG: bigger buttons with icons added for small fingers and little eyes.

DEV: added small shell script to retrieve all log messages since last
tag (useful for changelog).

DEV: added --no-pager to git command to avoid paging and cutting long
lines.
CHG: add screen density info to bug or enhancement email.
DEV: get rid of warning because Display import isn't needed anymore.

DEV: added DOCTYPE entry to all XML files to avoid Eclipse warnings
about missing DTD or schema
DEV: bump version to 2014.03.01.17 and edit changelog.
